snippet.title: Assault Suit Leynos 2 Saturn Tribute – Reveal Trailer – LRG3 2024
snippet.description:
The 90s hardcore mecha game, exclusive to Japan until now! 

Assault Suit Leynos 2 is finally making its way to the West, following in the footsteps of Assault Suit Leynos and Assault Suit Valken. Now upgraded with new features and quality-of-life improvements. Suit up and start the assault... again!

Follow Clear River Games on X for updates: http://www.x.com/clearrivergames

Developed by 2024 CITY CONNECTION CO., LTD.
Published by Clear River Games AB.
